SEARCH
Package model

Class Hotel

java.lang.Object
model.Hotel
public class Hotel extends Object
This class simulates a hotel that has rooms and can accept reservations of those rooms.
Author:
Sean Benedict Bernardo, Luis Andrew Madridijo

    • isValidHotelName

      public static boolean isValidHotelName(String name)
      Hotel name validity checker (does not check for uniqueness)
      Parameters:
      name - String of candidate hotel name
      Returns:
      Returns true if hotel name is valid, i.e. nonempty or null

    • addRoom

      public Room addRoom(char roomType) throws Exception
      Add a room to roomsList naming convention is room type followed by
      Parameters:
      roomType - character representation of what type of room is to be added
      Returns:
      added Room
      Throws:
      Exception - if the hotel is full

    • removeRoom

      public void removeRoom(String roomName) throws Exception
      Deletes room from roomsList In removing a room we check for the following 1. Does the room exist? 2. Does the room have any active bookings? 3. Is the room not the only one left in the hotel? If all checks have been satisfied then we delete the room and return true Don't do anything and return false otherwise
      Parameters:
      roomName - name of room to be removed
      Throws:
      Exception - when room fails one of the aforementioned conditions

    • createReservation

      public void createReservation(String guestName, int checkInDate, int checkOutDate, String roomName, String discountCode) throws Exception
      Validates and creates a reservation in this hotel In creating a reservation, we check for the following: 1. Does a room of a given roomName exist in the hotel? 2. Is this room available during all specified days of the stay? If both conditions are satisfied, add the reservation to the reservationsList otherwise, do nothing
      Parameters:
      guestName - name of guest making the reservation
      checkInDate - date when guest will check-in to the hotel
      checkOutDate - date when guest will check-out of the hotel
      roomName - name of the room the guest will be reserved assumed to be the string of an integer from 1 - 50
      discountCode - discountCode to be applied, NO
      Throws:
      Exception - if the guest name is empty, either the room is not found, or room is occupied in the given date range

    • removeReservation

      public void removeReservation(String reservationId) throws Exception
      Removes the reservation at a particular index of the reservationsList If the provided index is within the range of reservationList, then delete the reservation at that index else print an error message and do nothing
      Parameters:
      reservationId - Id of the reservation to be deleted
      Throws:
      Exception - when reservationIndex is out of range

      Returns:
      float of hotel base price

    • setBasePrice

      public void setBasePrice(float basePrice) throws Exception
      Updates base price of hotel Only updates if the following are satisfied: 1. There are no active bookings 2. The new price is at least than 100.0
      Parameters:
      basePrice - new updated base price
      Throws:
      Exception

    • getNightRates

      public NightRate getNightRate(int index)
      Getter for a specific night
      Parameters:
      index - integer of specific night
      Returns:
      NightRate at given index

    • setNightRate

      public void setNightRate(int index, float newRate) throws Exception
      Parameters:
      index - index night rate to be modified
      newRate - new rate to be applied to the room
      Throws:
      Exception - if the hotel still has reservations, the index is out of range, or the new rate is outside of the specified 50% - 150% range

    • getTotalRevenue

      public float getTotalRevenue()
      Returns the total revenue across the entire hotel The total revenue is the sum of the total price of all reservations
      Returns:
      float of total revenue
